# Core Rule 6 - Do not discuss or evade bans This is a zero tolerance rule.
You may only discuss bans at https://forum.spacestation14.com/c/ban-appeals/appeals-game/40
Unless you are completing antagonist objectives, evading role bans by gaining access to, impersonating, or taking over a banned role will result in a game ban. Evading a game ban will result in a voucher ban.
